Name: George
description: George is aged 47 and married with five children.  He is a permanent resident of Rwekitooma Nyarugote Bushenyi.  He deals in banana growing on a three acre piece of land. Additionally he deals in tea trade. He is requesting for one million UGX loan to buy manure and mulch for his banana plantation. He is thankful for financial support from Kiva and Ugafode.
